raw-sql.name: show
raw-sql.query:
SELECT type, features FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE ancetres as (
SELECT cd_taxsup, cd_nom, cd_ref as aïeul, lb_nom FROM inpn.taxref_v8 where cd_nom = :id
UNION
SELECT syn.cd_taxsup, syn.cd_nom, syn.cd_ref AS aïeul, syn.lb_nom FROM inpn.taxref_v8 tax join inpn.taxref_v8 syn USING(cd_ref) where tax.cd_nom = :id
UNION
SELECT tax.cd_taxsup, tax.cd_nom, f.aïeul, f.lb_nom FROM inpn.taxref_v8 tax JOIN ancetres f ON tax.cd_taxsup = f.cd_nom
), data as (
SELECT cd_nom, obs.geometrie, id_obs FROM ancetres a JOIN saisie.saisie_observation obs using (cd_nom) group by cd_nom, obs.geometrie, id_obs
), grid as (
select g.geometrie from export.grille_10km g join ign_geofla.commune c on st_intersects(c.geometrie, g.geometrie) where code_reg = '91' group by g.geometrie
), feature as (
SELECT 'Feature' AS type , row_to_json((SELECT ct FROM (SELECT count(id_obs) AS nombres) AS ct)) AS properties , cast(ST_AsGeoJson(st_transform(g.geometrie, 4326)) as json) AS geometry FROM grid g left JOIN data obs ON st_intersects(obs.geometrie, g.geometrie) group by g.geometrie )
SELECT 'FeatureCollection' as type , array_to_json(array_agg(feature)) as features from feature ) as geojson

raw-sql.name: show
raw-sql.query:
SELECT cd_taxsup, cd_nom, nom_vern, lb_nom, rang, ordre, phylum, classe, famille, observations, especes, communes, observateurs FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE descendants(cd_nom, cd_taxsup, cd_ref, info) AS ( SELECT cd_nom, cd_taxsup, cd_ref, array[cd_nom, cd_taxsup, ordre, phylum, famille, classe, nom_vern, lb_nom, rang] as info FROM inpn.taxref_v8 WHERE cd_nom = :id
UNION ALL
SELECT e.cd_nom, e.cd_taxsup, e.cd_ref, info FROM descendants AS ss JOIN inpn.taxref_v8 AS e ON e.cd_taxsup = ss.cd_nom )
SELECT info[1] as cd_nom, info[8] as lb_nom, info[2] as cd_taxsup, info[3] as ordre, info[4] as phylum, info[5] as famille, info[6] as classe, info[7] as nom_vern, info[9] as rang, count(id_obs) as observations, count(distinct code_insee) as communes, count(distinct observateur) as observateurs, count(distinct o.cd_nom) as especes FROM descendants ss JOIN inpn.taxref_v8 i ON i.cd_ref = ss.cd_ref LEFT JOIN saisie.saisie_observation o ON i.cd_nom = o.cd_nom WHERE i.cd_ref = ss.cd_nom group by info[1], info[2], info[3], info[4], info[5], info[6], info[7], info[8], info[9] ) as infos

raw-sql.name: show
raw-sql.query:
SELECT cd_nom, lb_nom, rang FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE parents as (
SELECT cd_taxsup, cd_nom, lb_nom, rang, cast(0 as bigint) as ordre FROM inpn.taxref_v8 where cd_nom = :id
UNION
SELECT i.cd_taxsup, i.cd_nom, i.lb_nom, i.rang, a.ordre + 1 FROM inpn.taxref_v8 i JOIN parents a ON i.cd_nom = a.cd_taxsup WHERE i.rang != :limit )
select cd_nom, lb_nom, rang from parents order by ordre desc ) as parents

raw-sql.name: show
raw-sql.query:
SELECT cd_nom, isref, lb_nom, cd_ref, nom_valide FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE ancetres as (
SELECT cd_taxsup, cd_ref, cd_nom, lb_nom, rang, nom_valide FROM inpn.taxref_v8 where cd_nom = :id
UNION
SELECT inpn.taxref_v8.cd_taxsup, inpn.taxref_v8.cd_ref, inpn.taxref_v8.cd_nom, inpn.taxref_v8.lb_nom , inpn.taxref_v8.rang, inpn.taxref_v8.nom_valide FROM inpn.taxref_v8 JOIN ancetres a ON inpn.taxref_v8.cd_taxsup = a.cd_nom )
select a.cd_nom, a.cd_ref=a.cd_nom as isref, a.lb_nom, a.cd_ref, a.nom_valide from ancetres a left join saisie.saisie_observation o using (cd_nom) where lower(lb_nom) like lower(:q) or lower(nom_valide) like lower(:q) group by a.cd_nom, a.cd_ref, a.lb_nom, a.nom_valide order by isref desc, lb_nom asc limit 50 ) as childs

raw-sql.name: firstChildObs
raw-sql.query:
SELECT cd_nom, lb_nom, observations FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE descendants(cd_nom, cd_taxsup, profondeur) AS ( SELECT cd_nom, cd_taxsup, lb_nom FROM inpn.taxref_v8 WHERE cd_nom = :id UNION ALL SELECT e.cd_nom, e.cd_taxsup, concat(profondeur,'->',concat(e.lb_nom,':',e.cd_nom)) FROM descendants AS ss JOIN inpn.taxref_v8 AS e ON e.cd_taxsup = ss.cd_nom )
SELECT split_part(split_part(profondeur,'->',2),':',2) as cd_nom, split_part(split_part(profondeur,'->',2),':',1) as lb_nom, count(distinct id_obs) as observations FROM descendants JOIN saisie.saisie_observation USING(cd_nom) WHERE profondeur ILIKE '%->%' GROUP BY split_part(profondeur,'->',2) ORDER BY observations desc ) as first_child_obs

raw-sql.name: show
raw-sql.query:
SELECT cd_nom, lb_nom FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE ancetres as (
SELECT cd_taxsup, cd_ref, cd_nom, lb_nom, rang FROM inpn.taxref_v8 where cd_nom = :id
UNION
SELECT inpn.taxref_v8.cd_taxsup, inpn.taxref_v8.cd_ref, inpn.taxref_v8.cd_nom, inpn.taxref_v8.lb_nom , inpn.taxref_v8.rang FROM inpn.taxref_v8 JOIN ancetres a ON inpn.taxref_v8.cd_taxsup = a.cd_taxsup
), brothers as ( select cd_nom, lb_nom from ancetres where cd_ref=cd_nom ) select * from brothers order by 1 ) as brothers
